MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig bool IsDoubleQuote(char character) cil managed
Public Shared Function IsDoubleQuote (character As Char) As Boolean

Docs.summary: This type/member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.Indicates a value whether a specified character is enclosed in double quotation marks (").
Docs.returns: true if the character is enclosed in double quotation marks ("); otherwise, false.
